text: Álvaro Teherán (January 6, 1966 – May 4, 2020) was a Colombian basketball player. He was born in the town of María La Baja, Colombia. He was selected as the 44th overall pick in the 1991 NBA Draft by the Philadelphia 76ers. Teherán played college basketball at Houston Baptist from 1987 to 1989 and Houston from 1989 to 1991. In December 2019, Teherán was hospitalized for renal failure in Cartagena, Colombia. He died on May 4, 2020 at the age of 54.Falleció Álvaro Teherán, leyenda del baloncesto colombiano ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Colombian sportspeople Category:Deaths from renal failure
title: Álvaro Teherán
